Articles.Content:
Hi all! I' ve work a bit on my eliminator concept jet car, and finally i've finish the work on it (for now ).

It's a sportive hybrid car (electric and jet engine); in electric mode can go up to 20m/s, in jet mode can reach 200 km/h (55 m/s).

It's a roadster so it's cooler than a normal car, batman shoul be jealous of jebs and bill =)!

Stats:

-Max speed: up to 60m/s

-Max crew capacity: 2

-Max fuel load: 45

-Batteries load: 1730

Instructions:

-Eva ur kerbals and right click on the seats and click "board"

-Use WASD for run on electric mode

-Press 1 for toggle jet mode

IMPORTANT NOTE

Engine power is setted to 26% setting to higher values can cause crashes, going faster than 60m/s is not safer!

The car comes colored in lime green (if u have kerbpaint plugin), otherwise it is loaded in default colour.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

DOWNLOAD

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mantide-jet-car-roadster/

Edited March 7, 2014 by eorin
Done a little correction on the craft file (little improvement of stability) but is not necessary if don't want to redownload the file
Reminds me of the Lamborghini Aventador. Nice!
Omg. Really nice design! Never would have thought of that myself!
Bump I don't want this car to fade into darkness
